Package thothbot.parallax.core.shared.scenes

Here are Scene object - the main rendering object and all Scene additions such as fog.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractFog
    Abstract realization of FogAbstract.
    Fog
    This class implements simple fog with near and far options.
    FogExp2
    This class implements fog with density.
    Scene
    3D Scene.

Package thothbot.parallax.core.shared.scenes Description
